snippet: World number four Stan Wawrinka cruised past Croatian teenager Borna Coric 6-3 7-5 to claim his third successive Chennai Open title on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: World number four Stan Wawrinka cruised past Croatian teenager Borna Coric 6-3 7-5 to claim his third successive Chennai Open title on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Brushes Past Coric for Chennai Hat-Trick
headline.main: Wawrinka Brushes Past Coric for Chennai Hat-Trick
